name: 301-ArtifactRecovery
description:
301-artifact recovery

You are assigned a mission to recover the following artifact:

Once The artifact is Recovered you can leave the Planet.

Artifact is hidden in the Maze , you cannot exit the ship without retrieving it.Stay Alive soldier you got this!

My main aim was to get familiar with blueprints,ill be adding more complex stuff to this game (more levels,advanced traps,ai enemies & some cinematics and yes better lighting too lol) im aware of some bugs ill fix them when i update this game XD.made this in 2 days.
